title: What Makes R2-D2 The 'Most Beloved Robot In The Galaxy'
teaser: R2-D2, the robot in Star Wars, is the subject of an article in Smithsonian Magazine. NPR's Rachel Martin talks to the author, Clive Thompson, about how R2-D2 became such a beloved robot.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
